verbs.description: roxbury school [V: declared] [ARG1: safe] [ARGM-TMP: after door complaints a building inspection found roxbury elementary school safe] [ARGM-TMP: after a parent claimed the front doors at the school compromised security the district chief operations officer clarence zachery] said the doors were safe just old he could not list particular issues with the six front doors at the school which were described as a top priority to be replaced the doors are just old zachery they need replacements throughout the building because of age but they are secure clarence zachery jackie heftman roxbury school domenic tramontozzi stamford california department of transportation conn engineer chief operations officer stamford connecticut david mannis zachery zauer principal board of education door lou casolo mark bonasera paul sauer department of engineering safe roxbury roxbury elementary school peter dreyer
